'''2.3.228''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on June 8, 2022.

== Additions ==
* Added code to make the new Java + Bedrock bundle work.
* Work to support M1 Mac devices.

== Changes ==
* Various entitlements, offline mode & stability improvements.

== Fixes ==
* Game installation bug fixes.
* {{Bug|MCL-19213}} - Cannot open relative game directories in system file picker.
* {{Bug|MCL-21218}} - Play button size doesn't match across the 3 game pages.
* {{Bug|MCL-21425}} - Unable to update Launcher.</onlyinclude>
